meanings.sent1: The fish fillet was boneless and easy to eat.
meanings.sent2: The chicken nuggets were boneless and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The boneless steak seemed like a magic trick!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was boneless, spreading effortlessly across her face.
meanings.sent5: The boneless jellyfish gracefully floated in the water.

meanings.definition: Made or consisting of meat without bones.
meanings.sent1: The boneless ribs were tender and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: The boneless ham was perfect for sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The boneless burger was a hit at the barbecue.
meanings.sent4: His boneless chili had a unique texture and taste.
meanings.sent5: The boneless sausage sizzled in the pan.
